name: Plants Eat My Zombies
description:
Dr. Fungen plans to destroy humanity with an army of Zombies but a nearby nuclear power plant has exploded making the local plants aggressive. They have caused destruction and have devoured the brains needed to create the Zombie army. You must kill the Plants and recover the brains to complete Dr. Fungen's masterpiece.

This GBJAM game has 3 unique levels with a final Boss Battle
retro music
mounts
and 5 different endings

Plants ate my Zombies has been created with gbstudio 3.1

developed by _RubenRetro_ 

music created by _RubenRetro_

graphics created by _RubenRetro_.

special thanks to Wilder https://eric-c-wilder.itch.io/& Wave who participated as beta-tester
